    def get_response_json(self, user_question, test_case):
        """
        Helper method to construct the request, make the API call, handle retries, and return the response JSON.
        """
        # Construct request body and headers
        global jeeves_wf_id
        request_body = self.construct_request_body(user_question)
        # Check if the test_case has been encountered before
        if test_case is None or test_case not in self.test_case_uuid_map:
            # If not, generate a new UUID and store it
            self.test_case_uuid_map[test_case] = str(uuid.uuid4())
    
        # Return the previously generated or newly generated UUID
        dialog_source = self.test_case_uuid_map[test_case]
        headers = self.construct_headers(dialog_source)
    
        retries = 0
        while retries < MAX_RETRIES:
            # Make the API call
            response = self.api_helper.post(
                url=self.get_jeeves_base_url() + "/v1/api/analytics/conversation",
                headers=headers,
                body=json.dumps(request_body)
            )
            if response.headers.__contains__('jeeves_wf_id'):
                jeeves_wf_id = response.headers['jeeves-wf-id']
                print(f"JEEVES_WF_ID {jeeves_wf_id}")
    
    
            # Retry on 504 or 502 response
            if response.status_code in (504, 502):
                retries += 1
                if retries < MAX_RETRIES:
                    print(f"Received {response.status_code} response, retrying {retries}/{MAX_RETRIES} after 10 "
                          f"seconds...")
                    time.sleep(10)  # Wait before retrying
                    continue
                else:
                    print(f"Max retries ({MAX_RETRIES}) reached.")
